name: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Primer Surfacer B‑307

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Primer Surfacer is an alkyd-type paint formulated to provide depth build for the final coats of BOYSEN®® Quick Drying Enamel.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: Ideally used as primer surfacer for interior and exterior wooden surfaces.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body:
Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter. Hammer all nails deep enough to apply putty. Sand rough wood until smooth and then dust off before painting.
For repainting, scrape off all loose, scaling, flaking, and peeling paint as necessary. Make sure that the surface is clean, dry, and good weather persists prior to painting.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: Wooden Surfaces
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Primer Surfacer B‑307 Putty: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311 Topcoat: BOYSEN®® Quick Drying Enamel (any desired color)
